title: "China says automakers must have licences for mapping data in smart cars"
excerpt: "SHANGHAI/BEIJING: China has said that automakers must apply for licences to collect geographic data using sensors on their intelligent vehicles, highlighting Beijing's security concerns about the growing sophistication of smart cars' mapping capabilities."
